MoonMetrics Chart Reader is your AI-powered companion for quick and insightful cryptocurrency chart analysis. Whether you're a seasoned trader or just starting out, this extension brings professional-level chart interpretation right to your browser.

How It Works:

Navigate to your favorite crypto chart website (e.g., TradingView, DexScreener).
Click the MoonMetrics icon to capture and analyze the current chart.
Review the AI-generated analysis covering key points like trend direction, support/resistance levels, and potential trade setups.
Ask follow-up questions for more specific insights.

Perfect For:

Day traders seeking quick market overviews

Crypto enthusiasts looking to deepen their technical analysis skills
Anyone interested in getting AI-assisted insights into cryptocurrency markets

Upgrade your crypto trading game with MoonMetrics Chart Reader. Get instant, AI-powered analysis at your fingertips and make more informed trading decisions today!
Note: This extension requires an OpenAI API key for full functionality. API usage may incur charges based on your OpenAI plan.
